price: 18 Il en fut donc ainsi par la volonté d’Allah qui ne cessera de ruiner les desseins des mécréants.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُوهِنُ كَيۡدِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: dhālikum wa-anna al-laha mūhinu kaydi al-kāfirīna
